snippet.title: Ghoul Grind: Night of the Necromancer Official Trailer (AVAILABLE NOW ON ITCH.IO!!!)
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE NOW!!!

Ghoul Grind: Night of the Necromancer is an auto-scrolling action platformer playable right on your very own NES and Dreamcast(or your Mapper 30 compatible NES clone console/emulator or Dreamcast Emulator/GDEMU)! 

Play as justice seeking vigilante Nox "Nightser" Francisca and his dagger adept girlfriend Veronica Mimieux. Grind your way through the eerie town of St. Crypton and stop your best friend Vlad Drachovi from raising the dead before midnight strikes on All Hallows Eve!

Physical Copies available here:

https://woogworx.company.site/

Digital Copies available here:

Our Website:

https://woogworx.com/

Our Instagram:

https://www.instagram.com/woogworxofficial/

Our Twitter:

https://twitter.com/WoogWorx

Guitar/Music: Woogz
Music Production: Timmy Turner
